channel.title: Karim Anaya-Izquierdo on Karim Anaya-Izquierdo
channel.description: Recent content in Karim Anaya-Izquierdo on Karim Anaya-Izquierdo

item.title: Manif
item.description:
My Stats manifesto

  • Unreproducible code for reproducible research

  • Let the data speak

My science manifesto

  • Think (a bit) then write

My personal manifesto

  • kk

  • kk

item.title: Models for time-to-event data using the cumulative hazard function
A bit of Maths in Latex (test post)
Another test
item.description:
library(ggplot2)

n<-1000

x<-rnorm(n)

y<-rnorm(n)

test<-data.frame(x=x,y=y)

aplot<-ggplot(test,aes(x,y))+geom_point()

aplot

item.title: Example simulation
item.description:
This is an example simulation

x<-runif(100)
plot(x)

item.title: On the Geometric Interplay Between Goodness-of-Fit and Estimation: Illustrative Examples
Towards the Geometry of Model Sensitivity: An Illustration
The relative frailty variance and shared frailty models
Self-Controlled Case Series Analysis With Event-Dependent Observation Periods
